name: Living torch
description:
Living torch is a platformer where you control a torch trying to do what torches do, I guess.

This is what I managed to finish for the  RDNA game jam, guess starting few days before the jam ended wasn't a good idea after all...

If the game doesn't run well in browser, download it for your system and if that didn't help run the executable you downloaded

I'll probably update the game after jam or something because the idea seems cool

Also have I mentioned this is my first ever(playable) game and game jam submission?
So I look forward to feedback if any comes, anyway, enjoy this thing

Controls:
A/D - rotate
W - tip up
Space - jump
F5 - return checkpoint
F7 - reset level

Credits:

  • Art:
    • most of the game and torch: https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack
    • trees, bushes, rocks, other tiles: https://aamatniekss.itch.io/free-pixelart-tileset-cute-forest
    • ugly stuff's mine
  • engine: godot
  • idk
